statements: DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_id = 1 AND event_name = 'Conference';
DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND participant_id = 100;
DELETE FROM Exhibitions WHERE sculptor_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE organization = 'Art Club'
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE organization = 'Artists Union' AND event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Sculptures WHERE artist = 'Leonardo Da Vinci';
